testcase.name: testClear1Line

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=4, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .SS | III SS. | III ... | III ... | III ZZ. | III
step=1, rand=4, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .S. | III .SS | III ..S | III ... | III ZZ. | III
step=2, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ... | III .S. | III .SS | III ..S | III ZZ. | III
step=3, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ... | III ... | III .S. | III .SS | III ZZS | III
step=4, rand=4, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .SS | III SS. | III ... | III .S. | III .SS | III

testcase.name: testClear1LineMiddle

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: When a new tetromino is placed, any full lines are removed from the board. If a lines is removed, the lines above it are moved down to such that the line is replaced by the line above it. Empty lines are added to the top to ensure the game has the correct height. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .Z.. | IIII .Z.. | IIII ZZZ. | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=1, rand=0, actions=<RotateRight> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII ..I. | IIII .Z.. | IIII .Z.. | IIII ZZZ. | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=2, rand=0, actions=<Right> Want | Got ✗ ------------ ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .Z.. | IIII .Z.. | IIII ZZZ. | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=3, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .Z.I | IIII .Z.. | IIII ZZZ. | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=4, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII .... | IIII ...I | IIII ...I | IIII .Z.I | IIII .Z.I | IIII ZZZ. | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=5, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII ...I | IIII .Z.I | IIII .Z.I | IIII ZZZI | IIII ZZ.. | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=6, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .Z.I | IIII .Z.I | IIII ZZZI | IIII ZZ.I | IIII Z.Z. | IIII
step=7, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .Z.. | IIII .Z.I | IIII ZZZI | IIII ZZ.I | IIII Z.ZI | IIII
step=8, rand=0, actions=<Down> Want | Got ✗ ------------ .... | IIII IIII | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .... | IIII .Z.. | IIII .Z.I | IIII ZZ.I | IIII Z.ZI | IIII
